Dart Monkey.name: Dart Monkey
Dart Monkey.abilities: Activated Ability(s) Super Monkey Fan Club Plasma Monkey Fan Club
Dart Monkey.targeting: Targeting Options First , Last , Close , Strong , Camo Prioritization with Enhanced Eyesight
Dart Monkey.related_towers: Dart Monkey (pre-BTD4) , for the pre-BTD4 counterpart Dart Monkey (BTD4) , for the BTD4 counterpart Dart Monkey (BTD5) , for the BTD5 counterpart Dart Monkey (BTDB2) , for the BTDB2 counterpart

Path 1.name: Sharp Shots
Path 1.description: Can pop 1 extra Bloon per shot.
Path 1.effect: Gains +1 pierce, for 3 pierce by default. Gains +3 pierce with Crossbow or Sharp Shooter, and for Crossbow Master it gains +8 pierce.

Path 1.name: Razor Sharp Shots
Path 1.description: Can pop 2 more bloons per shot.
Path 1.effect: Gains +2 pierce, for 5 pierce by default. Gains +5 pierce (total: +8) with Crossbow or Sharp Shooter, and for Crossbow Master it gains +8 pierce (total: +16).

Path 1.name: Spike-O-Pult
Path 1.description: Converts the Dart Monkey into a slower attacking Spike-o-pult that hurls large spiked balls. Each ball can pop lots of Bloons and rebounds off obstacles.
Path 1.effect: Hurls spiked balls that pop up to 19 bloons per shot, deal 2 damage and pop Frozen bloons, increases the range by 15%. Spiked balls bounce off obstacles and can rehit the same bloons again if the projectile hits any obstacle. Attacks slightly slower (1.15s instead of 0.95s).

Path 1.name: Juggernaut
Path 1.description: Hurls a giant spiked ball that pops lead and excels at crushing Ceramic and Fortified Bloons.
Path 1.effect: Hurls juggernaut balls that pop up to 61 bloons per shot, pop all Bloon types except Camo, deal 2 damage, +3 to Ceramics and +2 to Fortified, and gains extra projectile speed. Attacks slightly faster (1s instead of 1.15s). Inflicts a speed-based knockback for 0.15s upon hitting Bloons.

Path 1.name: Ultra-Juggernaut
Path 1.description: Gigantic spiked ball splits twice into 6 Juggernaut balls for even more destructive power against Ceramic, Fortified and Lead Bloons.
Path 1.effect: Hurls gigantic juggernaut balls that retains knockback effect and each dealing 5 damage, +8 to Ceramics, +20 to leads and +5 to Fortified, have 210 pierce, travel faster, and split twice into 6 mini juggernaut balls every half pierce bloons hit. These mini juggernaut balls each have 2 damage, +3 ceramic damage, +2 fortified damage, and 50 pierce. Both main projectile and mini projectiles can rehit bloons if they hit any walls.

Path 2.name: Quick Shots
Path 2.description: Shoots 15% faster.
Path 2.effect: Attacks +17.6% faster (0.85x attack cooldown).

Path 2.name: Very Quick Shots
Path 2.description: Shoots 33% faster!
Path 2.effect: Attacks +50% faster than base Dart Monkey (attack cooldown from 0.85x to 0.67x (~2/3x)).

Path 2.name: Triple Shot
Path 2.description: Throws 3 darts at a time instead of 1.
Path 2.effect: Throws 3 darts per attack, in a 30° spread, and increases attack speed by +33%.

Path 2.name: Super Monkey Fan Club
Path 2.description: Super Monkey Fan Club Ability: Converts up to 10 nearby Dart Monkeys including itself into Super Monkeys for 15 seconds. Regular attack speed also increased.
Path 2.effect: Gains an ability that transforms itself and up to 9 of the nearest non-special Dart Monkeys into Super Monkeys, which have 40 range. Cannot affect catapult-operating Dart Monkeys nor crossbow wielders nor the Plasma Monkey Fan Club. Has a cooldown of 50 seconds. Attacks 2x faster than Triple Shot (attack cooldown from 0.474s to 0.24s (~1/2).

Path 2.name: Plasma Monkey Fan Club
Path 2.description: Elite membership of this club grants the Dart Monkeys even more power.
Path 2.effect: Ability now transforms the club leader and up to 20 of the nearest non-special Dart Monkeys into Super Monkeys that shoot plasma blasts instead of darts. The plasma attacks twice as fast, deals 2 damage per hit and has 5 pierce.

Path 3.name: Long Range Darts
Path 3.description: Makes the Dart Monkey shoot further than normal.
Path 3.effect: Gains +8 range and increases projectile lifespan by 15%.

Path 3.name: Enhanced Eyesight
Path 3.description: Shoots even further and can detect Camo bloons.
Path 3.effect: Gains +8 range on top of previous upgrades, 20% increased projectile lifespan, 10% increased projectile speed, camo detection and the Camo Prioritization targeting option. Also more knockback force on Juggernaut.

Path 3.name: Crossbow
Path 3.description: Uses a long range Crossbow that can pop 3 layers of Bloon for every hit.
Path 3.effect: Deals 3 damage per hit, gains extra pierce, slightly increase projectile speed, and gains +12 range, for a total of 60 range.

Path 3.name: Sharp Shooter
Path 3.description: Sharp Shooter attacks faster and does powerful Crit shots every few shots that do a lot more damage.
Path 3.effect: Deals 6 damage per hit, attacks every 0.475s instead of 0.95s, projectile speed further increased, and lands a Critical Hit after every 10 shots. Crits deal 50 damage per hit.

Path 3.name: Crossbow Master
Path 3.description: Crossbow Master shoots really fast and devastates most Bloon types with ease.
Path 3.effect: Attacks every 0.2375s instead of 0.475s, and deals 8 damage per hit and deals 80 damage per Critical Hit, increases pierce from 4 to 8, range from 60 to 80, and applies Critical Hits every 5 shots instead of every 10 shots. Can also damage any bloon type.

Boomerang Monkey.name: Boomerang Monkey
Boomerang Monkey.cost: Cost $265 ( Easy ) $315 ( Medium ) $340 ( Hard ) $380 ( Impoppable ) - $50 with Cheap 'Rangs Monkey Knowledge
Boomerang Monkey.abilities: Activated Ability(s) Turbo Charge Perma Charge
Boomerang Monkey.targeting: Targeting Options First , Last , Close , Strong , Change Hands
Boomerang Monkey.related_towers: Boomerang Thrower (pre-BTD4) , for the pre-BTD4 counterpart Boomerang Thrower (BTD4) , for the BTD4 counterpart Boomerang Thrower (BTD5) , for the BTD5 counterpart Boomerang Monkey (BTDB2) , for the BTDB2 counterpart

Path 1.name: Improved Rangs
Path 1.description: Can pop up to 8 Bloons per throw.
Path 1.effect: Gains +4 pierce, equivalent to 8 pierce for most upgrades. Even more pierce on certain upgrades.

Path 1.name: Glaives
Path 1.description: Throws glaives instead of boomerangs. Glaives are bigger and faster, hitting more Bloons with each throw.
Path 1.effect: Gains +5 pierce on top of the previous upgrade, equivalent to 13 pierce for most upgrades. Also gives +50% knockback for MOAB Press. Even more pierce for certain upgrades.

Path 1.name: Glaive Ricochet
Path 1.description: Glaives will bounce from Bloon to Bloon automatically and aggressively.
Path 1.effect: Glaives automatically bounce towards each bloon with sharp turning. Pops up to 30 bloons per glaive. Glaives can travel through obstacles, and can jump up to 60 units between targets.

Path 1.name: M.O.A.R Glaives
Path 1.description: Multiple Object Advanced Ricochet greatly enhances the already extraordinary powers of the Glaive Ricochet Monkey.
Path 1.effect: Pierce increased from 30 to 60, +1 damage to Ceramics, attack speed is triple, glaive bounce distance is greatly increased.

Path 1.name: Glaive Lord
Path 1.description: Glaive Lord surrounds itself in 3 special glaives that shred anything that comes near. Glaive Lord's glaives now rip through MOAB-class Bloons, slowly tearing them apart from the inside.
Path 1.effect: Gains a sharp 30 range zone that deals 2 damage every 0.08 seconds to all affected bloons in radius, including Camo Bloons, +8 to Ceramics and +5 to MOAB-class. Main glaive deals +7 damage and +8 to Ceramics, is capable of rehitting the same targets at a 0.6s cooldown, and can now inflict a shredding damage-over-time to MOAB-class, slowly dealing 100 damage every 1.0s for 10s, and bounce anywhere on screen.

Path 2.name: Faster Throwing
Path 2.description: Throws boomerangs faster.
Path 2.effect: Attacks +33% faster (0.75x attack cooldown).

Path 2.name: Faster Rangs
Path 2.description: Boomerangs fire and travel faster.
Path 2.effect: Attacks +33% faster (0.75x attack cooldown) on top of the previous upgrade, and projectile speed increased.

Path 2.name: Bionic Boomerang
Path 2.description: Replaces arm with a strong bionic arm that can throw boomerangs extremely fast and does extra damage to MOAB-class bloons.
Path 2.effect: Attacks over 5x faster (0.1983x attack cooldown) than an ordinary Boomerang Monkey and deals +2 damage to MOAB-class.

Path 2.name: Turbo Charge
Path 2.description: Turbo Charge ability: Makes this Monkey attack incredibly fast for 10 seconds.
Path 2.effect: Ability makes the Boomerang Monkey attack 7x faster and deal +1 damage for 10 seconds. Has a cooldown of 45 seconds.

Path 2.name: Perma Charge
Path 2.description: Perma Charge has a permanent super fast attack speed. Ability increases the lethality even more.
Path 2.effect: Permanently gains Turbo Charge attack speed and deals 4 damage by default. Ability now deals +8 damage for 15 seconds. With Red Hot Rangs, its attacks deal another +4 damage, and the ability damage is further increased by +2.

Path 3.name: Long Range Rangs
Path 3.description: Can throw boomerangs further than normal.
Path 3.effect: Gains +14.19 range (+33%) and boomerangs are thrown on a wider curve.

Path 3.name: Red Hot Rangs
Path 3.description: Allows boomerangs to pop Frozen and Lead Bloons and do more damage to all.
Path 3.effect: Pops any bloon type and main attack and Glaive Lord's glaive orbitals deal +1 damage. Gives even more damage with Perma Charge.

Path 3.name: Kylie Boomerang
Path 3.description: Throws heavy Kylie boomerangs that follow a straight path instead of curved.
Path 3.effect: Kylie boomerangs are thrown and returned in a straight path instead of curved. Pierce improves to 18 and can rehit the same bloons after 0.3 seconds.

Path 3.name: MOAB Press
Path 3.description: Heavy Kylie boomerangs hit MOAB-Class Bloons multiple times per throw and sometimes knocks them back a short way along the path.
Path 3.effect: Independently throws a powerful knockback boomerang at MOAB-class bloons every once in a while, dealing 1 damage to Bloons in its path, and 5 to MOABs, while pushing them backwards by a set amount of distance. These boomerangs have 200 pierce and can re-damage Bloons after 0.1 seconds. Path 1 upgrades increase pierce and knockback distance.

Path 3.name: MOAB Domination
Path 3.description: Special knockback kylies trigger more often and do lots of extra damage.
Path 3.effect: Kylie boomerangs deal +10 damage, and have +36 pierce (+54 with Glaives), all attacks fire twice as fast, plus much stronger special knockback boomerangs. Special knockback boomerangs deal increased MOAB-class damage, have +100 pierce, double range, and produce a powerful burning explosion upon projectile expiry for even more damage.

Bomb Shooter.name: Bomb Shooter
Bomb Shooter.abilities: Activated Ability(s) MOAB Assassin MOAB Eliminator
Bomb Shooter.targeting: Targeting Options First , Last , Close , Strong
Bomb Shooter.related_towers: Cannon , for the pre-BTD4 counterpart Bomb Tower (BTD4) , for the BTD4 counterpart Bomb Tower (BTD5) , for the BTD5 counterpart Bomb Shooter (BTDB2) , for the BTDB2 counterpart

Path 1.name: Bigger Bombs
Path 1.description: Shoots larger bombs, they have a larger blast area and more popping power.
Path 1.effect: Explosions have much greater blast area (12 to 18) and gain +6 pierce.

Path 1.name: Heavy Bombs
Path 1.description: Heavy duty bombs can smash through 2 layers of Bloon at once and pop more Bloons.
Path 1.effect: Explosions deal +1 damage and gain an additional +10 pierce.

Path 1.name: Really Big Bombs
Path 1.description: Huge bombs deal greater damage in a large area and knock Bloons back along the path.
Path 1.effect: Explosions have even greater blast area (18 to 27), deal 4 damage instead of 2, and have 80 pierce. With Frag Bombs, improves fragment damage, pierce, count, and lifespan. Pushes back Bloons hit by 20 units.

Path 1.name: Bloon Impact
Path 1.description: Explosions become so violent Bloons are stunned for a short time when they are hit. Range is increased and frags are even more
Path 1.effect:
ive.
Effect:
Explosions stun affected bloons for 1.4s. Gains +3 range. With Frag Bombs, improves frag pierce, count, and lifespan.

Path 1.name: Bloon Crush
Path 1.description: Bloon shattering explosions do massive damage and can stun MOAB-Class bloons.
Path 1.effect: Explosions deal 24 damage, pop Black Bloons, and stun both MOAB-class and normal bloons for 2.0s. With Frag Bombs, fragments deal much more damage and gain much more pierce. Pushes back MOAB-class Bloons hit by 5 units.

Path 2.name: Faster Reload
Path 2.description: Reloads faster.
Path 2.effect: Attacks +33% faster (0.75x attack cooldown).

Path 2.name: Missile Launcher
Path 2.description: Exchanges bombs for missiles, which fire faster, fly faster, and increase range.
Path 2.effect: Attacks +36% faster (0.7333x attack cooldown) on top of the previous upgrade, gains +4 range, and gains +50% projectile speed.

Path 2.name: MOAB Mauler
Path 2.description: MOAB Maulers do much more damage to MOAB-Class Bloons.
Path 2.effect: Explosions deal 16 damage to MOAB-class. Also gains +5 range.

Path 2.name: MOAB Assassin
Path 2.description: Assassinate MOAB ability: Special missile flies out and does massive damage to MOAB-Class Bloons. Regular attack range and MOAB-class damage also increased.
Path 2.effect: Ability targets a blimp on screen based on standard targeting and deals an instant 750 damage plus a weaker explosion to the first blimp hit. Main attack deals 31 damage to MOAB-class and 5 damage to Ceramics, and gains +5 range.

Path 2.name: MOAB Eliminator
Path 2.description: Massive damage to MOABs and Assassinate ability deals 6x damage with a short cooldown.
Path 2.effect: Ability targets a blimp on screen based on standard targeting and deals an instant 4500 damage to the first blimp hit with 3x faster ability cooldown. Main attack deals 100 damage to MOAB-class.

Path 3.name: Extra Range
Path 3.description: Increases attack range.
Path 3.effect: Gains +12 range.

Path 3.name: Frag Bombs
Path 3.description: Explosions throw sharp fragments that can pop more Bloons.
Path 3.effect: Adds +2 range. Explosions produce sharp fragments that pop up to 1 bloon each. Frags cannot pop lead bloons. Frags can be improved with higher-level Path 1 upgrades.

Path 3.name: Cluster Bombs
Path 3.description: Throws out secondary bombs instead of sharp fragments every shot.
Path 3.effect: Produces 1 cluster of 8 smaller secondary bombs that pop up to 8 bloons per secondary bomb.

Path 3.name: Recursive Cluster
Path 3.description: Every second shot the cluster bombs send out more cluster bombs for even more destruction.
Path 3.effect: Every second shot, the bomb explodes three times per shot with much larger explosions and huge pierce. Can hit the same target up to 17 times despite visuals depicting 73 explosions. All explosions dealing 2 damage, instead of 1 now.

Path 3.name: Bomb Blitz
Path 3.description: Deals much more damage and gains the passive Bomb Storm Ability - when lives are lost, the Bomb Storm automatically triggers, which destroys all but the biggest of Bloons.
Path 3.effect: Attacks every 0.9s now (0.6x attack cooldown), and deals 5 damage per explosion, creates recursive explosions every shot, and gains a passive ability that deals an instant 2000 damage on screen and then wipes out MOABs and below after a Bloon leaks or losing a life.

Tack Shooter.name: Tack Shooter
Tack Shooter.abilities: Activated Ability(s) Blade Maelstrom Super Maelstrom
Tack Shooter.targeting: Targeting Options None First , Last , Close , Strong with Inferno Ring
Tack Shooter.related_towers: Tack Shooter (pre-BTD4) , for the pre-BTD4 counterpart Tack Shooter (BTD4) , for the BTD4 counterpart Tack Shooter (BTD5) , for the BTD5 counterpart Tack Shooter (BTDB2) , for the BTDB2 counterpart

Path 1.name: Faster Shooting
Path 1.description: Shoots tacks faster.
Path 1.effect: Attacks +33% faster (0.75x attack cooldown). Abilities from Blade Maelstrom and Super Maelstrom gain +17.9% attack speed (0.85x attack cooldown).

Path 1.name: Even Faster Shooting
Path 1.description: Shoots tacks even faster.
Path 1.effect: Attacks an additional +33% faster (0.75x attack cooldown). Abilities from Blade Maelstrom and Super Maelstrom gain further +17.9% attack speed (0.85x attack cooldown).

Path 1.name: Hot Shots
Path 1.description: Shoots superhot tacks that do extra damage and can pop Lead Bloons.
Path 1.effect: Pops Frozen and Lead, tacks deal +1 damage.

Path 1.name: Ring of Fire
Path 1.description: Damages many more Bloons with a deadly ring of flame instead of tacks.
Path 1.effect: Instead of tacks, creates bursts of flame that deal 5 damage per shot against up to 30 bloons. Attacks +100% faster (0.315s attack cooldown) but can no longer pop Purples. More pierce via Super Range Tacks, and more damage via Path 3 crosspaths.

Path 1.name: Inferno Ring
Path 1.description: Deadly inferno of flame roasts Bloons into oblivion.
Path 1.effect: Powerful bursts of flame deal 8 damage, plus an extra +4 damage to MOAB-class, and attacks much faster. Range is increased from 23 to 35, pierce from 30 to 45. Also creates explosive burning meteors that deal 700 damage each onto a specific target, creating an explosion that sets bloons on fire, dealing 50 damage per second.

Path 2.name: Long Range Tacks
Path 2.description: Tacks fly out further than normal.
Path 2.effect: Adds +4 range and increases projectile speed.

Path 2.name: Super Range Tacks
Path 2.description: Even longer range tacks that can pop more Bloons.
Path 2.effect: Adds +3 pierce and another +4 range. Ring of Fire and Inferno Ring add +15 pierce to their main attack, and Inferno Ring's meteor gets an additional +1 pierce. The Tack Zone receives +8 pierce and +16 range instead of the default stat increases.

Path 2.name: Blade Shooter
Path 2.description: Switches tacks out for sharp blades that can pop up to 5 additional Bloons.
Path 2.effect: Adds +15 range. Instead of tacks, dispenses large shattering blades that pop up to 8 bloons instead of 4, including Frozen Bloons.

Path 2.name: Blade Maelstrom
Path 2.description: Blade Maelstrom ability: Covers the area in a storm of blades.
Path 2.effect: Ability distributes two spinning waves of higher-damage blades in a clockwise direction for 3 seconds. Main attack deals 2 damage instead of 1.

Path 2.name: Super Maelstrom
Path 2.description: Even more powerful Maelstrom ability and lasts longer.
Path 2.effect: Ability distributes four spinning waves of high damage, higher-pierce blades in a clockwise direction for 9 seconds. Main attack pops Lead and does 5 damage.

Path 3.name: More Tacks
Path 3.description: Shoots 10 tacks instead of 8, plus increases Ring of Fire damage.
Path 3.effect: Shoots 10 tacks per shot instead of 8. Ring of Fire gains +1 damage instead of more tacks. Blade Maelstrom ability fires blades counter-clockwise instead of clockwise and lasts 0.5 seconds longer. Super Maelstrom ability lasts 1.5 seconds longer.

Path 3.name: Even More Tacks
Path 3.description: Shoots out 12 tacks per shot and increases Ring of Fire damage further.
Path 3.effect: Shoots 12 tacks per shot instead of 10. Ring of Fire gains an extra +1 damage (total +2). Blade Maelstrom ability duration increased by a further 0.5 seconds. Super Maelstrom ability duration increased by a further 1.5 seconds.

Path 3.name: Tack Sprayer
Path 3.description: Sprays out 16 higher pierce tacks per volley.
Path 3.effect: Shoots 16 tacks per shot and gains +1 pierce.

Path 3.name: Overdrive
Path 3.description: Shoots incredibly fast.
Path 3.effect: 3x attack speed.

Path 3.name: The Tack Zone
Path 3.description: Many, many tacks.
Path 3.effect:
Shoots 32 tacks per shot, and attacks +66% faster than before (x0.6 attack cooldown). Adds +7 range and does extra damage per shot to
MOAB-Class Bloons
.

Ice Monkey.name: Ice Monkey
Ice Monkey.targeting: Targeting Options None First , Last , Close , Strong with Cryo Cannon or higher
Ice Monkey.camo: Camo Detection Yes (2-x-x, or x-4-x ability)
Ice Monkey.related_towers: Ice Ball , for the pre-BTD4 counterpart Ice Tower (BTD4) , for the BTD4 counterpart Ice Tower (BTD5) , for the BTD5 counterpart Ice Monkey (BTDB2) , for the BTDB2 counterpart

Path 1.name: Permafrost
Path 1.description: Bloons move slowly even after thawing out.
Path 1.effect: Slows bloons by 50% after thawing out. Lasts as many layers as the freeze does. At Tier 5, the Permafrost effect can affect blimps but by 25% instead.

Path 1.name: Cold Snap
Path 1.description: Can freeze and pop Lead Bloons and Camo Bloons.
Path 1.effect: Detects camo and can freeze and pop Lead Bloons.

Path 1.name: Ice Shards
Path 1.description: Removes Camo and Regrow properties when damaging Bloons. Razor sharp shards fly out when Frozen Bloons pop.
Path 1.effect: Bloons frozen by this Ice Monkey will each release three equally-spaced shards if popped while frozen, also taking off Camo and Regrow properties, and increases its range by 5.

Path 1.name: Embrittlement
Path 1.description: Can hit MOAB-class Bloons. All hit Bloons become brittle, take extra damage while frozen, and losing Lead immunity for a short time.
Path 1.effect: All bloons, including Leads and MOAB-class, will become temporarily vulnerable to damage from sharp and freezing attacks, temporarily take +1 damage, and permanently lose Camo and Regrow properties. Can target MOAB-class bloons, as well as decamo DDTs and temporarily cause DDTs to become brittle and lose their Lead properties.

Path 1.name: Super Brittle
Path 1.description: Bloons take huge damage while frozen including MOAB-class Bloons.
Path 1.effect: Bloons, including MOAB-class, take +4 damage if frozen, on top of previous upgrade's benefits. Popping frozen Bloons produces 6 shards per bloon instead of 3 shards, each shard now dealing 5 damage. Attacks 33% faster. Can apply Permafrost on MOAB-class bloons, at 25% slowdown to MOAB-class.

Path 2.name: Enhanced Freeze
Path 2.description: Attacks faster and freezes for longer.
Path 2.effect: Attacks +33% faster (0.75x attack cooldown) and freezes bloons for 1.75s instead of 1.5s.

Path 2.name: Deep Freeze
Path 2.description: Increases pierce, freezes an extra layer and freeze lasts longer.
Path 2.effect: Freezes through 2 layers of Bloon and freezes bloons for 2.2s instead of 1.75s. Pierce increases from 40 to 45.

Path 2.name: Arctic Wind
Path 2.description: Gains a super cold aura that slows Bloons and freezes water nearby.
Path 2.effect: Freeze-vulnerable bloons are slowed by 40% within range. Can freeze water in range to let land towers become placeable on water. Water can only be frozen on initial tower placement, and not for existing towers, whether they are moved to the Ice Monkey's radius or the terrain is altered to become water.

Path 2.name: Snowstorm
Path 2.description: Snowstorm Ability: Freezes all regular Bloons on screen, briefly freezes White, Zebra, and Camo, and slows MOAB-class.
Path 2.effect: Increases range from 20 to 30. Ability will freeze all bloons on screen, including White and Zebra, except Leads unless given lead-popping power. MOAB-class, White, Zebra, and Camo are frozen for only 3 seconds, while all other affected bloons are frozen for a full 6 seconds. Ability freeze soaks through 2 non-blimp layers. Has a cooldown of 30 seconds.

Path 2.name: Absolute Zero
Path 2.description: Ability is so cold it freezes all regular Bloons for longer, including White, Zebra, and Camo, slows MOAB-class longer, and greatly increases the attack speed of all Ice Monkeys for the duration.
Path 2.effect: Pierce increased from 45 to 300 and range from 30 to 40. Freezes all bloons currently on screen for a full 10 seconds, including freeze-immune. For the same duration, all Ice Monkeys attack +50% faster. Both main attack and ability soak up to 4 non-blimp layers. Reduced cooldown from 30s to 20s.

Path 3.name: Larger Radius
Path 3.description: Larger freeze area.
Path 3.effect: Gains +7 range.

Path 3.name: Re-Freeze
Path 3.description: Can re-freeze Bloons that are already frozen.
Path 3.effect: Self-explanatory

Path 3.name: Cryo Cannon
Path 3.description: Rapidly shoots smaller ice bombs over longer range.
Path 3.effect: Converts slow radial ice blasts into moderately fast-shooting snowballs. Snowball blasts deal 2 damage and freeze up to 40 bloons within a tighter 20 blast radius, but freeze duration is decreased from 1.5 seconds to 1.2 seconds. Gains +19 range over other upgrades for a total of 46.

Path 3.name: Icicles
Path 3.description: Does bonus damage to MOAB-Class Bloons. Frozen Bloons grow sharp icicles that can pop Bloons that touch them.
Path 3.effect: Bloons affected by ice blasts will grow sharp icicles on top of them. Icicles deal 2 damage onto up to 3 bloons and act like spike piles. Icicles will thaw after 2 seconds. Can directly target MOAB-class bloons but not apply slowdown statuses, and deals +8 damage to MOAB-class bloons with the ice blast. Also attacks slightly faster.

Path 3.name: Icicle Impale
Path 3.description: Shoots huge icicle spikes that do huge damage to MOAB-Class Bloons and freezes them.
Path 3.effect: Ice blasts deal 50 damage to MOAB-class bloons and can freeze them. Attacks +33% faster.

Glue Gunner.name: Glue Gunner
Glue Gunner.abilities: Activated Ability(s) Glue Strike Glue Storm
Glue Gunner.targeting: Targeting Options First , Last , Close , Strong
Glue Gunner.statuseffects: Status Effects Glued Status: Affected bloons move at 50% speed, lasts for 11s and soaks through 3 layers of bloon.
Glue Gunner.related_towers: Glue Gunner (BTD4) , for the BTD4 counterpart Glue Gunner (BTD5) , for the BTD5 counterpart Glue Gunner (BTDB2) , for the BTDB2 counterpart

Path 1.name: Glue Soak
Path 1.description: Glue soaks through all layers of Bloon.
Path 1.effect: Soaks through all non-blimp layers of bloon. Cannot soak through MOAB-class, even with upgrades.

Path 1.name: Corrosive Glue
Path 1.description: Glued Bloons pop one layer every few seconds.
Path 1.effect: Slowly deals damage to bloons every 2.0s while glued. Can target MOAB-class but does not slow them down and only lasts for half duration.

Path 1.name: Bloon Dissolver
Path 1.description: Can glue one additional Bloon per shot and solvents melt two layers every second.
Path 1.effect: Corrosion rate increased to 1 damage per 0.5s or 2 damage per 0.5s to Ceramics, glue gains +1 pierce, and attacks twice as fast.

Path 1.name: Bloon Liquefier
Path 1.description: Applies liquefying compounds that do 10 pops every second, and drops powerful acid onto the track after destroying a Bloon.
Path 1.effect: Corrosion rate increased to 1 damage per 0.1s, or 3 damage per 0.1s versus Ceramics. Bloons that were directly glued leave a puddle of acid on the track when popped. Acid puddles inflict lots of damage.

Path 1.name: The Bloon Solver
Path 1.description: Bloons a problem? Here's the solution.
Path 1.effect: Corrosion rate increases versus Ceramics and MOAB-class to 8 damage per 0.1s for Ceramics and 6 damage per 0.1s for MOAB-class. Glue attack becomes a twin splatter attack with 5 pierce per splash, plus much more acid puddle damage. Attacks 2x faster.

Path 2.name: Bigger Globs
Path 2.description: Can coat 2 Bloons per shot.
Path 2.effect: Glue projectile gains +1 pierce.

Path 2.name: Glue Splatter
Path 2.description: Splatters glue across up to 6 Bloons per shot.
Path 2.effect: Converts glue attack into a splash attack, gluing up to 5 bloons per shot (equivalent to +3 pierce). Also increases pierce of any secondary effects from the glue.

Path 2.name: Glue Hose
Path 2.description: Shoots glue 3x as fast!
Path 2.effect: Triples its attack speed.

Path 2.name: Glue Strike
Path 2.description: Glue Strike ability: Glues all Bloons on screen, causing them to take more damage from all sources while it lasts.
Path 2.effect:
Gains an ability that glues all bloons currently on screen and renders affected bloons vulnerable to +2 damage per instance and temporarily stop
Frozen
and
Lead
properties while glued.

Path 2.name: Glue Storm
Path 2.description: Glue Storm Ability: Pelts the whole screen with glue for 20 seconds.
Path 2.effect: Ability improved, allowing the ability to glue all bloons currently on screen every 1.0s until the ability expires. Alongside effects from its predecessor, ability glue now gains double lifespan.

Path 3.name: Stickier Glue
Path 3.description: Makes glue
Path 3.effect:
last much longer.
Effect:
Glue lasts for 24.0s instead of 11.0s.

Path 3.name: Stronger Glue
Path 3.description: Slows down Bloons even more.
Path 3.effect: Slows down bloons by 75% instead of 50%.

Path 3.name: MOAB Glue
Path 3.description: Improved glue formula allows it to stick to MOAB-class Bloons.
Path 3.effect: Can glue MOAB-class bloons and slows them down by 37.5% for full duration.

Path 3.name: Relentless Glue
Path 3.description: Popped Bloons that were glued stun nearby Bloons.
Path 3.effect: If the Glue Gunner glues a bloon, and that bloon is popped while glued, it will cause nearby bloons, MOABs, and visible DDTs to become stunned.

Path 3.name: Super Glue
Path 3.description: Glue so strong it temporarily immobilizes all affected Bloons!
Path 3.effect: Glue immensely damages and pops bloons over time, directly deals damage on-hit versus MOAB-class bloons, and greatly improves the slowdown against all affected bloon types. Slowing down BFBs by 95% and ZOMGs by 90%, while every other lower-tier bloon type is locked in place. Increases base pierce by 6. Also can rehit the same glued bloon. Popped bloons now stun nearby BFBs and ZOMGs, and MOAB-class bloons are stunned for the full duration.

Sniper Monkey.name: Sniper Monkey
Sniper Monkey.cost: Cost Default: $300 ( Easy ) $350 ( Medium ) $380 ( Hard ) $420 ( Impoppable ) Advanced Logistics : $285 (Easy) $330 (Medium) $360 (Hard) $400 (Impoppable) Military Conscription : $200 (Easy) $235 (Medium) $255 (Hard) $280 (Impoppable) Both : $185 (Easy) $215 (Medium) $235 (Hard) $260 (Impoppable)

Path 1.name: Full Metal Jacket
Path 1.description: Shots pop through 4 layers of bloon, and both bullets and shrapnel can pop Lead and Frozen Bloons.
Path 1.effect: Bullets deal 4 damage and pop Frozen and Leads. With Shrapnel Shot, shrapnel pieces also pop Frozen and Lead and deal 2 damage.

Path 1.name: Large Calibre
Path 1.description: Shots can pop through 7 layers of Bloon.
Path 1.effect: Bullets deal 7 damage instead of 4. With Shrapnel Shot, each shrapnel piece deals 3 damage instead of 2.

Path 1.name: Deadly Precision
Path 1.description: 20 damage per shot, plus bonus damage to Ceramics.
Path 1.effect: Bullets deal 20 damage plus +15 damage to Ceramics. With Shrapnel Shot, each shrapnel piece deals 4 damage instead of 3.

Path 1.name: Maim MOAB
Path 1.description: Deals much more damage and immobilizes MOAB class bloons for a short time.
Path 1.effect: Bullets temporarily stun MOAB-class bloons and deal 30 damage instead of 20. With Shrapnel Shot, each shrapnel piece deals 6 damage instead of 4 and can stun MOAB-class bloons.

Path 1.name: Cripple MOAB
Path 1.description: Crippled MOABs are immobilized for longer and take extra damage from all other attacks.
Path 1.effect: Bullets temporarily cripple MOAB-class bloons, rendering them vulnerable to +5 damage and become stunned for longer, on top of 140 damage per bullet instead of 30, plus a small deadly area-of-effect that inflicts collateral damage. With Shrapnel Shot, each shrapnel piece deals 12 damage instead of 6, pierces up to 3 bloons, and can cripple MOAB-class bloons.

Path 2.name: Night Vision Goggles
Path 2.description: Allows Sniper to detect and do an additional 2 damage to Camo bloons.
Path 2.effect: Gains camo detection, and all attacks deal +2 damage to Camo Bloons.

Path 2.name: Shrapnel Shot
Path 2.description: Damaged bloons spray out a cone of sharp shrapnel.
Path 2.effect: If a bloon is damaged, it will spray out a cone of sharp shrapnel in the same direction as the bullet. Shrapnel improves damage potential with Path 1 upgrades. Shrapnel cannot hit the bloon which spawned it.

Path 2.name: Bouncing Bullet
Path 2.description: Shots bounce to new targets up to 2 times.
Path 2.effect: Bullet can bounce onto nearby targets, popping up to 3 bloons each. Bullets produce shrapnel in the direction of the bullet prior to collision every time they damage bloons.

Path 2.name: Supply Drop
Path 2.description: Supply Drop ability: Drops a crate full of cash and activates Supply Drop for other snipers. Regular attack also damages Lead Bloons and increases Shrapnel popping power.
Path 2.effect: Ability gives $1100 cash when deployed cash crate is collected. If other Supply Drop abilities are ready, activates all of them simultaneously. Bullets pop Frozen and Lead, hit up to 5 Bloons, and each shrapnel piece has 5 pierce instead of 2.

Path 2.name: Elite Sniper
Path 2.description: Supply Drop gives much more cash. Grants Elite targeting prio and faster reload to all snipers.
Path 2.effect: Ability gives $3000 cash when deployed cash crate is collected, and activates the abilities of all other Supply Drop Snipers that are not on cooldown. Attacks +150% faster (0.4x attack cooldown) and gives all other Snipers +33% attack speed (0.75x attack cooldown).

Path 3.name: Fast Firing
Path 3.description: Shoots faster than normal.
Path 3.effect: Gains +42% attack speed (0.70x attack cooldown).

Path 3.name: Even Faster Firing
Path 3.description: Shoots even faster!
Path 3.effect: Gains a further +42% attack speed (0.70x attack cooldown), for a total of 0.49x attack cooldown

Path 3.name: Semi-Automatic
Path 3.description: Attacks 3x as fast!
Path 3.effect: 3x attack speed on top of previous upgrades, for a total of x0.167 attack cooldown

Path 3.name: Full Auto Rifle
Path 3.description: Fully automatic weapon with incredible popping power.
Path 3.effect: 2x attack speed on top of previous upgrades (for a total of x0.0808 attack cooldown), and bullets deal +2 MOAB-class damage. With Shrapnel Shot, deals +1 MOAB-class damage via shrapnel.

Path 3.name: Elite Defender
Path 3.description: Fires super fast and does more damage to MOAB-class Bloons. Fires faster the further the Bloons are along the track. Gains 4x attack speed briefly on losing lives.
Path 3.effect: 2x attack speed on top of previous upgrades (for a total of x0.0404 attack cooldown), as well as attacking an additive percentage amount faster depending on how close the Bloons are nearing the exit. If lives are lost, attacks 4x faster for about 7 seconds (on top of other attack speed bonuses). Bullets deal +4 damage to MOAB-class Bloons.

Monkey Sub.name: Monkey Sub

Path 1.name: Longer Range
Path 1.description: Increases attack range.
Path 1.effect: Gains +10 range.

Path 1.name: Advanced Intel
Path 1.description: Allows long range targeting of Bloons in radius of your other towers.
Path 1.effect: Allows the Monkey Sub to target any bloon within the range of any tower on screen. Can target Camo Bloons detected in the range of any tower with direct camo detection.

Path 1.name: Submerge and Support
Path 1.description: Adds Submerge targeting option that permanently reveals Camo bloons in its radius but does not attack while submerged.
Path 1.effect: Gains the Submerge targeting option. When active, it produces a non-damaging decamo wave every 1.5s that hits up to 100 affected bloons within range, but the Sub cannot use other attacks while submerged.

Path 1.name: Bloontonium Reactor
Path 1.description: Submerge to detect Camo, pop Bloons and reduce ability cooldowns of nearby water-based Monkeys by 15%.
Path 1.effect: When submerged, creates a radioactive damage zone that pops up to 50 bloons every cycle, decamos much faster, and reduces ability cooldowns of nearby water-based towers by 15%. Unsubmerged dart deals 2 damage instead of 1.

Path 1.name: Energizer
Path 1.description: Reduces ability cooldowns everywhere by 20%. While in radius, heroes earn XP 50% faster and water Monkey ability cooldowns are halved.
Path 1.effect: Submerging allows its damage zone to deal 5 damage per cycle instead of 1, +5 versus Ceramics, reduces ability cooldowns of all towers on screen by 20%, gives nearby heroes with 50% more XP, and nearby water-based towers gain 50% reduced ability cooldowns instead of 20%. Main dart and airburst attack damage increased from 1 to 5.

Path 2.name: Barbed Darts
Path 2.description: Sub's darts can pop an additional 3 bloons each. Enhances pierce of other weapons.
Path 2.effect: Darts pop 5 bloons per shot instead of 2. Also gives Reactors and Submerge Sub decamo pulses +50 pierce.

Path 2.name: Heat-tipped Darts
Path 2.description: Heat tipped darts allow the Monkey Sub to pop Frozen and Lead Bloons.
Path 2.effect: Darts can pop Frozen and Lead Bloons, and Reactors can pop Lead Bloons and allow the radiation to inflict bonus damage to Leads.

Path 2.name: Ballistic Missile
Path 2.description: Missile seeks target within range and does extra MOAB and Ceramic damage.
Path 2.effect: Gains a ballistic missile attack. Missiles fly in the sky and crash onto the target bloon. Missile explosions deal 6 damage to MOAB-class and Ceramics, and pop up to 60 bloons. Also gains +8 range.

Path 2.name: First Strike Capability
Path 2.description: First Strike Ability: A devastating missile strike targeting the largest bloon on screen, plus splash damage.
Path 2.effect: Ability shoots a large missile that deals 20,000 damage onto the strongest bloon on screen plus a splash with 1000 damage onto up to 80 bloons.

Path 2.name: Pre-Emptive Strike
Path 2.description: Automatically triggers a powerful missile attack whenever MOAB-Class Bloon spawns from the Bloon entrance.
Path 2.effect: Every time a MOAB-class bloon enters the screen, it will automatically inflict 750 damage to them. In addition, it gains even stronger and faster ballistic missiles and a faster ability cooldown.

Path 3.name: Twin Guns
Path 3.description: Added twin gun doubles attack speed, and enhances attack speed of other weapons.
Path 3.effect: Dart gains 2x attack speed, and the attack speed of alternate attacks increases.

Path 3.name: Airburst Darts
Path 3.description: Airburst darts split into 3 on impact for massively increased popping power.
Path 3.effect: Main dart now splits into 3 darts on impact.

Path 3.name: Triple Guns
Path 3.description: Adds a third gun for even faster firing.
Path 3.effect: Increases attack speed by 1.5x. Retains the Airburst Darts attack.

Path 3.name: Armor Piercing Darts
Path 3.description: Special AP darts gain increased damage and popping power, plus additional damage to MOAB class Bloons.
Path 3.effect: Main dart deals 2 damage on-hit, 4 versus MOAB-class, while airburst darts have 5 pierce per dart instead of 2 and deal 2 damage versus MOAB-class.

Path 3.name: Sub Commander
Path 3.description: Adds extra pierce and damage to Commander and all Subs in its radius.
Path 3.effect: All Subs within range, including itself, deal double damage and gain +4 pierce. Also, the Sub Commander gains 2x attack speed and 2 additional airburst darts.

Path 1.name: Faster Shooting
Path 1.description: All weapons on board shoot faster.
Path 1.effect: Attacks +33% faster (0.75x attack cooldown)

Path 1.name: Double Shot
Path 1.description: Increases ship weapons fired.
Path 1.effect:
Increases the number of darts and grapes by +1, for double the
straight-sprayed
darts and a total of 6 grapes per shot (requires the Grape Shot crosspath).

Path 1.name: Destroyer
Path 1.description: Attacks super duper fast!
Path 1.effect: All attacks shoot 5X faster, for a total of 0.15 second for darts, though grapes 0.221 seconds.

Path 1.name: Aircraft Carrier
Path 1.description: Launches waves of fighter planes that strafe their targets and fire missiles at MOAB class Bloons.
Path 1.effect: Carrier planes can fly anywhere on the map and will continuously attack with fast front-shooting twin darts, radial darts, and anti-MOAB missiles. Retains normal Destroyer attacks. Carrier planes shoot frontal sprays of 6 grapes per shot if given the Grape Shot crosspaths. And grape's burn DoT increased from 2 to 4.

Path 1.name: Carrier Flagship
Path 1.description: Does extra damage. Can place other Monkeys on the upper decks of the ship and increases attack speed of all water based Monkeys and Monkey Aces.
Path 1.effect:
Planes deal more damage with all its attacks, and its Anti-MOAB missiles can pop any bloon type. And grape's burn DoT increased from 4 to 9. Towers placed on its upper decks will partially ignore Line of Sight. Attack speed of all water-based towers and
Monkey Aces
increased by +18% (0.85x attack cooldown).

Path 2.name: Grape Shot
Path 2.description: Adds a spray of 5 sharpened grapes to the ship.
Path 2.effect: Regularly shoots 5 grapes alongside its dart attack. Grapes pop up to 1 bloon each. Can shoot from both sides.

Path 2.name: Hot Shot
Path 2.description: Burning hot grape shot can pop Lead Bloons and set Bloons on fire.
Path 2.effect: Converts grapes into hot grapes of fire, popping Frozen and Lead Bloons and applying napalm. Hot grapes can no longer pop Purples.

Path 2.name: Cannon Ship
Path 2.description: Adds a powerful cannon that shoots out powerful bombs.
Path 2.effect: Instead of darts, shoots slightly slower-firing bombs with a large explosion radius, 2 damage, 28 pierce, and emits eight frags, similar to the 2-0-2 Bomb Shooter. Can shoot from both sides. Hot grapes now deal 3 damage.

Path 2.name: Monkey Pirates
Path 2.description: Adds 2 cannons to the ship and cannon attacks do more damage. MOAB Takedown Ability: harpoons a MOAB class Bloon and brings it down.
Path 2.effect: Ability immediately pulls down the strongest visible blimp on screen other than ZOMGs, BADs or Bosses, instantly destroying them. All attacks have significantly improved damage output; the main attack shoots 3 bombs per shot and deal 3 damage each and deal 5 extra damage to MOAB-Class. Grapes deal 3 damage and +2 damage to Ceramic bloons. And grape's burn DoT increased from 2 to 4.

Path 2.name: Pirate Lord
Path 2.description: Greatly improved power and can shoot many grappling hooks at once, plundering extra cash from each MOAB-class Bloon taken down.
Path 2.effect: Ability now shoots 6 grappling hooks at once, and can pull ZOMGs down with 3 hooks. Hooked blimps grant +100% more cash than would have been obtained by popping them normally. All attacks are 2x faster, and significantly improves damage of grapes and bombs. Grapes deal 8 damage with 8 extra damage to Ceramic bloons with additional increased burn damage, and bombs deal massive damage to MOAB-Class and much more fragment damage.

Path 3.name: Long Range
Path 3.description: Much longer range, and projectiles fly faster and pierce more.
Path 3.effect: Gains +11 range (18% more than base), increases projectile speed of all projectiles by +25%, and increases the pierce of many of the Buccaneer's weapons. Grapes gain +1 pierce, darts gain +2 pierce, Cannon Ship's cannonballs gain +7 pierce and frags gain +1 pierce.

Path 3.name: Crow's Nest
Path 3.description: Allows the ship to hit Camo Bloons.
Path 3.effect:
Gains camo detection. Also receives
Camo Prioritization
.

Path 3.name: Merchantman
Path 3.description: Generates cash each round automatically.
Path 3.effect: At the end of each round, generates $200.

Path 3.name: Favored Trades
Path 3.description: Attacks faster and generates lots of money per round. Monkeys in radius have increased sell value.
Path 3.effect: 2x faster attack speed, generates $500 at the end of each round, and increases sell value of nearby towers and itself by 4%. Stack with 3 Favored Trades. Grape's burn DoT increased from 2 to 4.

Path 3.name: Trade Empire
Path 3.description: Generates more cash per round, increases cash earned by up to 20 other Merchantmen by the number of Merchantmen, and boosts all Merchantmen damage.
Path 3.effect: Boosts income of up to 20 Merchantmen or Favored Trades by +$10 for every Merchantman and +$20 for every Favored Trades on screen. All Buccaneers with at least the Merchantman upgrade gain +1 damage and another +1 damage to MOAB-class and Ceramic Bloons. Generates $800 per round. Grape's burn DoT increased from 4 to 9.

Path 1.name: Rapid Fire
Path 1.description: Shoots faster than normal.
Path 1.effect: Attacks +33% faster (0.75x attack cooldown).

Path 1.name: Lots More Darts
Path 1.description: Shoots 12 darts at a time.
Path 1.effect: Shoots 12 darts per volley instead of 8.

Path 1.name: Fighter Plane
Path 1.description: Flies fast and launches anti-MOAB missiles.
Path 1.effect: Every 4 seconds shoots twin anti-MOAB missiles that deal 18 damage per shot and affect up to 4 blimps. Anti-MOAB missiles can only target MOAB-class bloons, and are locked on Strong.

Path 1.name: Operation: Dart Storm
Path 1.description: Shoots 16 darts per volley, and twice as fast.
Path 1.effect: Shoots 16 darts per volley, darts and missiles attack 2x faster (0.5x attack cooldown), and increases fighter plane missile damage to 24.

Path 1.name: Sky Shredder
Path 1.description: The bloons will wish they had never come.
Path 1.effect: Attacks 33% faster (0.251s~ attack cooldown), pops any bloon type (except Camo), and shoots 32 darts per volley. Darts deal 3 damage plus another +2 to Ceramics. Anti-MOAB missiles deal 150 damage and up to 5 blimps.

Path 2.name: Exploding Pineapple
Path 2.description: Drops pineapples to the ground that explode violently after a few seconds. Ace's explosive attacks are improved.
Path 2.effect: Drops exploding pineapples onto the ground every 1.6 seconds, and increases the pierce and blast radius of all of Ace's explosive attacks. Pineapples explode after 3 seconds and deal 1 damage to up to 20 bloons.

Path 2.name: Spy Plane
Path 2.description: Allows Monkey Ace to hit Camo Bloons and do more damage to them.
Path 2.effect: Allows Monkey Ace to hit Camo Bloons and any attacks deal x2 damage to Camo Bloons

Path 2.name: Bomber Ace
Path 2.description: Drops a line of bombs when crossing the Bloon track.
Path 2.effect: Instead of pineapples, drops an array of 4 bombs every 1.6 seconds but only when crossing the track. Bombs deal 3 damage per explosion, each bomb explodes in a 35 radius, and each explosion pops up to 20 bloons.

Path 2.name: Ground Zero
Path 2.description: Bomb damage increased significantly. Ground Zero Ability: Drops a huge bomb that destroys most things on screen.
Path 2.effect: Ability drops a nuke that inflicts 700 damage to all bloons on screen, including explosion-immune bloons, affecting up to 2000 bloons on screen and wiping out any weaker bloons. Main bomb explosions deal 15 damage instead of 3 and can pop up to 40 bloons.

Path 2.name: Tsar Bomba
Path 2.description: A very, very large bomb. Someone put a stop to this craziness!
Path 2.effect: Ability nuke deals 3000 damage, affects up to 5000 bloons on screen, and stuns all survivors of the blast except BADs. Has a shorter ability cooldown. Main bomb explosions deal 20 damage plus +10 more to Ceramics.

Path 3.name: Sharper Darts
Path 3.description: Darts can pop 8 Bloons each.
Path 3.effect: Darts pop up to 8 bloons and dropped bombs gain +12 pierce.

Path 3.name: Centered Path
Path 3.description: New central flight path for maximum map coverage.
Path 3.effect: Gains the Centered Path flight path, which moves the Ace along a unified path in a circular formation. This flight path can be adjusted so it flies around a different central point.

Path 3.name: Neva-Miss Targeting
Path 3.description: Darts automatically seek out and pop Bloons by themselves.
Path 3.effect: Darts will automatically rotate to continuously seek at nearby bloons, each dart accelerating and decelerating dynamically but lasting much shorter in the air.

Path 3.name: Spectre
Path 3.description: Rapidly fires darts and bombs, dominating most Bloon types easily.
Path 3.effect: Additionally shoots rapid-fire alternating darts and bombs that both seek. Darts deal 8 damage per shot, and pop up to 4 Bloons. Bombs deal 3 damage and +5 Ceramic damage to up to 20 bloons (+15 with Exploding Pineapple). Volleys of seeking darts deal 3 damage and last longer.

Path 3.name: Flying Fortress
Path 3.description: This is a BIG plane.
Path 3.effect: Attacks +50% faster (0.66x attack cooldown), shoots three rapid-fire attacks with separate targeting: first, last and close. Rapid-fire darts deal 8 damage and bombs deal 5 damage, and these darts deal a further +14 to MOAB-class, and both pop all bloon types. Volleys of seeking darts deal 6 damage and also pop all Bloon types.
